Welcome to All-In-One Agenda’s documentation!¶

class my_project.app.LoginForm(formdata=<object object>, **kwargs)¶

A form for entering username and password

class my_project.app.RegisterForm(formdata=<object object>, **kwargs)¶

A form for registering your username,password, and email address

class my_project.app.RequestResetForm(formdata=<object object>, **kwargs)¶

A form requesting for a valid email address in order to send a password reset link

class my_project.app.ResetPasswordForm(formdata=<object object>, **kwargs)¶

A form that changes your old password to a new password

class my_project.app.Todo(**kwargs)¶

A database table that holds data for a to do list. Has id, text, a completion option

class my_project.app.User(**kwargs)¶

Database table that stores personal info such as id, username, email, password, and to do list

my_project.app.bootstrap = <flask_bootstrap.Bootstrap object>¶

Creates a Boostrap object for app.py in order to use Bootstrap in Flask
